personal.name: Temesgen Gebreabzgi
personal.professional_summary: Ambitious Data Engineer with a Bachelor of Science in Information Systems from Addis Ababa University. Experienced in data science, software development, and data engineering techniques. Skilled in developing toolkits, templates, and user guides for data management tools. Adept at centralizing and organizing data, conducting research, and presenting findings to support decision-making.

description: Developed an automated system that transformed textual descriptions of advertisement concepts into detailed storyboards, enhancing the ad creation process, resulting in a 30% increase in creative output efficiency.
Collaborated with a team to create a scalable data warehouse for LLM fine-tuning using Amharic language data, effectively improving data accessibility and management for analysis tasks.
Designed and implemented a high-precision legal expert system for contract Q&A, using advanced NLP techniques which achieved a 25% increase in accuracy of contract inquiries.
